name: SlaveCorporation
description:
All characters in this game are 18 or older.

●Game Overview
If the mission fails, the endless "nightmare" awaits...
Infiltrate an evil corporation to take down the bad guys!

●Plot
"Saionji Kaori" is a spy that works for an intelligence agency.
She was a young and talented spy, helping to make the world a better place.
"Justice" was her calling.
And she also had another mission, to find her missing "friend".
　
One day, she gets some intel on her friend, but then...


● "Kaori Saionji"


●Game system
- Easy gameplay! No combat, explore-only RPG!
-Infiltrate evil corporations, collect evidence, and take down the "mastermind"!
-But infiltrating an evil corporation comes with a risk.
If she fails, the bad guys will come after her relentlessly...
-Play time
2 - 3 hours
*You can unlock all CGs within the first hour.
-Recollection room available
Finish the game to unlock all scenes
-No grotesque scenes, no blood.


Make one mistake and she'll be caught!
If she takes too long or fall for a trap...
She'll be taken in for questioning... Then...

If she gets caught, there's no way out...!
Will she succeed and come out on top, or fail miserably? Only time will tell...
